meta.description: Determine the least expensive way to meet nutritional requirements using four food options.

sets.name: FOOD_ITEMS
sets.description: Different food items considered for the meal plan.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content in grams for each food item.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content in grams for each food item.

params.name: calories
params.description: Calorie content for each food item.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost in dollars for each food item.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Amount of each food item to purchase.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[i] * x[i] for i in FOOD_ITEMS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing food items.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[i] * x[i] for i in FOOD_ITEMS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 71 grams of protein are consumed.

constraints.name: carbohydrate_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[i] * x[i] for i in FOOD_ITEMS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 141 grams of carbohydrates are consumed.

constraints.name: calorie_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[i] * x[i] for i in FOOD_ITEMS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 1839 calories are consumed.
